benefit.highDesc: Benefit is clearly measurable and quantifiable

costs.highDesc: High ongoing costs for AI processing

dataComplexity.title: Data Complexity and Diversity
dataComplexity.dataSourceDiversity: Data Source Diversity (Number of data types used.)
dataComplexity.dataIntegrity: Data Integrity (Degree of completeness and consistency of processable input data.)
dataComplexity.dataComplexity: Data Complexity (Difficulty level in interpreting the data.)
dataComplexity.dataLinking: Data Linking (Ability to combine multiple data sources in one analysis.)
dataComplexity.dataVolume: Data Volume (Amount of data per analysis.)

scoreLabels.1: Only one data type (e.g., laboratory data).
scoreLabels.5: Five or more data types (e.g., image, text, and genomic data).

diseaseComplexity.title: Disease Complexity
diseaseComplexity.diagnosticAmbiguity: Diagnostic Ambiguity (Difficulty in distinguishing from other clinical pictures.)
diseaseComplexity.multimorbidity: Multimorbidity (Influence of other diseases on the target disease.)
diseaseComplexity.diseaseSeverity: Disease Severity (Lethality and importance of early detection.)

questionComplexity.title: Question Difficulty Level
questionComplexity.differentialDiagnosticDepth: Differential Diagnostic Depth (Number of possible diagnoses to be considered in the request.)
questionComplexity.prognosticPrecision: Prognostic Precision (Degree of accuracy and long-term nature of prediction.)
questionComplexity.interdisciplinaryRelevance: Interdisciplinary Relevance (Number of specialties involved in the analysis.)
questionComplexity.dynamicAdaptability: Dynamic Adaptability (System's ability to respond to changes in clinical parameters.)

aiSupport.title: AI Support Level
aiSupport.recommendationComplexity: Recommendation Complexity (Scope of suggestions or action plans.)
aiSupport.guidelineIntegration: Guideline Integration (Extent of integration of medical standards.)
aiSupport.patientSpecificIndividualization: Patient-Specific Individualization (Consideration of individual patient characteristics.)

marketCompetition.title: Market & Competition
marketCompetition.subtitle: Analysis of market environment and competitive situation
marketCompetition.alternativeMethodCosts: Costs of current method per case (optional)
